chapps.tests.test_actions.test_actions module

Tests for response-action adapter objects

class chapps.tests.test_actions.test_actions.Test_PostfixActions

Bases: object

Tests for abstract Postfix action superclass

test_action_for_raises_not_implemented_error(postfix_actions)

The method action_for() is abstract and not implemented by PostfixActions

test_dunno(postfix_actions)

Returns DUNNO

test_dunno_accepts_useless_message(postfix_actions)

Returns DUNNO even if a message is supplied

test_okay(postfix_actions)

Returns OK

test_okay_accepts_useless_message(postfix_actions)

Returns OK even if a message is supplied

class chapps.tests.test_actions.test_actions.Test_PostfixGRLActions

Bases: object

Testing greylisting actions for Postfix

test_fail_yields_rejection(grl_actions)

Fail returns a string starting with DEFER_IF_PERMIT

test_pass_yields_dunno(grl_actions)

Pass returns DUNNO

class chapps.tests.test_actions.test_actions.Test_PostfixOQPActions

Bases: object

Testing outbound quota actions for Postfix

test_fail_yields_rejection(oqp_actions)

Fail returns a string starting with ‘554 Rejected’ or ‘REJECT’

test_pass_yields_okay(oqp_actions)

Pass returns OK

class chapps.tests.test_actions.test_actions.Test_PostfixSPFActions

Bases: object

Tests for Postfix action strings to be sent in response to particular SPF results: The possible results are:

pass* fail* softfail temperror* permerror* none/neutral (two which must be treated the same)

Starred items are ones for which RFC 7208 provides recommended SMTP result codes. For now, configuration will be able to override how the non-starred results are mapped onto actions taken for other classes of message. Eventually a response which implements greylisting (say, for softfails) will be provided, which could be applied also to none/neutral situations as well.

test_fail_produces_reject(spf_actions, spf_reason)
test_neutral_produces_greylist(spf_actions)
test_none_produces_greylist(spf_actions)
test_pass_produces_prepend(spf_actions, spf_reason)
test_permerror_produces_enhanced_code(spf_actions, spf_reason)
test_softfail_produces_greylist(spf_actions)
test_temperror_produces_enhanced_code(spf_actions, spf_reason)
